name: Alarm clock for Kids
description:
Alarm Clock for Kids -

a New Mobile App Project

I was presented with a task to make an alarm clock for a specific target group.

I choose to do it for young kids that have hard time to get up in the morning.


I designed the app with a Superhero/Villan theme.

The users can choose between two Modes -


  1. Superhero Mode - with bright colors and wide selection of superheroes theme songs.
  2. Villan Mode - with "evil", "bad" colors and a wide selection of villain theme songs. 


While designing I wrote Microcopy to make the app appeal to the kids using it.


I used some Plugins and noted them inside the file.

I Hope its help :)
